name: Henry P. SKOCZALEK, Appellant v. INMATE ACCOUNTING OFFICE, SCI Huntingdon; John Wetzel, Secretary, Department of Corrections; Attorney General of Pennsylvania, Appellees

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of August, 2013, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
